text: hello
Hi, I currently have a children's charity that I sponsor
ok tell me
We sponsor a child in El Salvador, we have been going it a number of years.
Thats great.
How about you do you have a favorite charity?
I donate money to save the children
what do you know about them are they a good charity?
Yes. Save the children is a great charity. They are really serious about helping children.
I see - how many years have you been with them
I have been donating money to save the children for 5 years. I give them 1000 dollars every year.
that is a good approach, i have been doing some research on charities
You can donate any amount to save the children. Would you like to donate a dollar or more to them?
well that would be a good but I would want to research them first to make sure they are good but maybe you have already done that
I have done my research and I can tell you they are a great organization full of kind / sincere people.
that's great maybe we could both donate to them
Yes that is a great idea. Would you like the link to their website?
sure can you send it to me
URL    - Have a great day.
thank you  for sharing it ...you as well
Thank you for your time.
